SQL.LOAD: select coverage_ded_id, coverage_id, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, deductible, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, deductible_expression_id from elp_coverage_ded where coverage_ded_id = :coverage_ded_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select coverage_ded_id, nvl(expr.expression_code, cdit.translation) as deductible_based_on, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, mdit.translation as method_of_repair, deductible from elp_coverage_ded, elp_list_item cli, elp_expression expr, elp_list cl, elp_dict_item_translation cdit, elp_list_item mli, elp_list ml, elp_dict_item_translation mdit where elp_coverage_ded.deductible_based_on_id = cli.list_item_id and cli.list_id = cl.list_id and elp_coverage_ded.deductible_expression_id = expr.expression_id(+) and cdit.dict_item_id = cli.dict_item_id and cdit.language_id = :language_id and cl.code = 'COMDEDUCTBASED' and elp_coverage_ded.method_of_repair_id = mli.list_item_id and mli.list_id = ml.list_id and mdit.dict_item_id = mli.dict_item_id and mdit.language_id = :language_id and ml.code = 'METHR' and coverage_id = :coverage_id
SQL.INSERT: insert into elp_coverage_ded ( coverage_ded_id, coverage_id, method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id, deductible, deductible_expression_id ) values ( :coverage_ded_id, :coverage_id, :method_of_repair_id, :deductible_based_on_id, :deductible, :deductible_expression_id )
SQL.UPDATE: update elp_coverage_ded set coverage_id = :coverage_id, method_of_repair_id = :method_of_repair_id, deductible_based_on_id = :deductible_based_on_id, deductible = :deductible, deductible_expression_id = :deductible_expression_id where coverage_ded_id = :coverage_ded_id
